solution_line_template: He releases 1 video that is {short_video_duration}*{long_video_multiplier}={long_video_duration} minutes long

So each day he releases {short_video_duration}+{short_video_duration}+{long_video_duration}=<<{short_video_duration}+{short_video_duration}+{long_video_duration}={daily_minutes}>>{daily_minutes} minutes of videos
That means he releases {daily_minutes}*{days_in_week}=<<{daily_minutes}*{days_in_week}={weekly_minutes}>>{weekly_minutes} minutes of videos
